properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 2 at 7:03AM CST until January 2 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dense fog will reduce visibility to one nautical mile
or less.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20
NM.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Low visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING
